item.title: Recursive Autoregressive Time Series Modeling
item.description: An auto-regressive model uses $n$ past observations to model the current value of an observed variable $$\begin{aligned}Y[t]=-\sum_{k=1}^{n}a_kY[t-k]\end{aligned}.$$ In this case, the observed variable, $Y[t]$, is the number of traffic incidents recorded by Austin-Travis County traffic reports and publicly available at the City of Austin open data portal. A Python script implements a recursive least squares estimator to compute the weights, $a_k$, and then generates a prediction of the numer of incidents for the next day.
